Detailed Description

Listener for route requests. The abstract functions are the callback functions that is called for the respective asynchronous function call in RouteInterface.

Create a subclass and implement the callbacks and add a subclass object to the RouteInterface to start getting route callbacks.

The error function, declared in the super class Listener, will be called for all requests that returns with an error. The status code can be either from the StatusCode enumeration or from RouteStatusCode enumeration.
